2501 
2502 void QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer::applyPattern( const QgsSymbolV2RenderContext& context, QBrush& brush, double lineAngle, double distance,
2503  double lineWidth, const QColor& color )
2504 {
2505  Q_UNUSED( lineWidth );
2506  Q_UNUSED( color );
2507 
2508  mBrush.setTextureImage( QImage() ); // set empty in case we have to return
2509 
2510  if ( !mFillLineSymbol )
2511  {
2512  return;
2513  }
2514  // We have to make a copy because marker intervals will have to be adjusted
2515  QgsLineSymbolV2* fillLineSymbol = dynamic_cast<QgsLineSymbolV2*>( mFillLineSymbol->clone() );
2516  if ( !fillLineSymbol )
2517  {
2518  return;
2519  }
2520 
2521  const QgsRenderContext& ctx = context.renderContext();
2522  //double outlinePixelWidth = lineWidth * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mLineWidthUnit, mLineWidthMapUnitScale );
2523  double outputPixelDist = distance * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mDistanceUnit, mDistanceMapUnitScale );
2524  double outputPixelOffset = mOffset * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mOffsetUnit, mOffsetMapUnitScale );
2525 
2526  // To get all patterns into image, we have to consider symbols size (estimateMaxBleed()).
2527  // For marker lines we have to get markers interval.
2528  double outputPixelBleed = 0;
2529  double outputPixelInterval = 0; // maximum interval
2530  for ( int i = 0; i < fillLineSymbol->symbolLayerCount(); i++ )
2531  {
2532  QgsSymbolLayerV2 *layer = fillLineSymbol->symbolLayer( i );
2533  double layerBleed = layer->estimateMaxBleed();
2534  // TODO: to get real bleed we have to scale it using context and units,
2535  // unfortunately estimateMaxBleed() ignore units completely, e.g.
2536  // QgsMarkerLineSymbolLayerV2::estimateMaxBleed() is mixing marker size and
2537  // offset regardless units. This has to be fixed especially
2538  // in estimateMaxBleed(), context probably has to be used.
2539  // For now, we only support millimeters
2540  double outputPixelLayerBleed = layerBleed * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, QgsSymbolV2::MM );
2541  outputPixelBleed = qMax( outputPixelBleed, outputPixelLayerBleed );
2542 
2543  QgsMarkerLineSymbolLayerV2 *markerLineLayer = dynamic_cast<QgsMarkerLineSymbolLayerV2 *>( layer );
2544  if ( markerLineLayer )
2545  {
2546  double outputPixelLayerInterval = markerLineLayer->interval() * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, markerLineLayer->intervalUnit(), markerLineLayer->intervalMapUnitScale() );
2547 
2548  // There may be multiple marker lines with different intervals.
2549  // In theory we should find the least common multiple, but that could be too
2550  // big (multiplication of intervals in the worst case).
2551  // Because patterns without small common interval would look strange, we
2552  // believe that the longest interval should usually be sufficient.
2553  outputPixelInterval = qMax( outputPixelInterval, outputPixelLayerInterval );
2554  }
2555  }
2556 
2557  if ( outputPixelInterval > 0 )
2558  {
2559  // We have to adjust marker intervals to integer pixel size to get
2560  // repeatable pattern.
2561  double intervalScale = qRound( outputPixelInterval ) / outputPixelInterval;
2562  outputPixelInterval = qRound( outputPixelInterval );
2563 
2564  for ( int i = 0; i < fillLineSymbol->symbolLayerCount(); i++ )
2565  {
2566  QgsSymbolLayerV2 *layer = fillLineSymbol->symbolLayer( i );
2567 
2568  QgsMarkerLineSymbolLayerV2 *markerLineLayer = dynamic_cast<QgsMarkerLineSymbolLayerV2 *>( layer );
2569  if ( markerLineLayer )
2570  {
2571  markerLineLayer->setInterval( intervalScale * markerLineLayer->interval() );
2572  }
2573  }
2574  }
2575 
2576  //create image
2577  int height, width;
2578  if ( qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 0 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 360 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 180 ) )
2579  {
2580  height = outputPixelDist;
2581  width = outputPixelInterval > 0 ? outputPixelInterval : height;
2582  }
2583  else if ( qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 90 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 270 ) )
2584  {
2585  width = outputPixelDist;
2586  height = outputPixelInterval > 0 ? outputPixelInterval : width;
2587  }
2588  else
2589  {
2590  height = outputPixelDist / cos( lineAngle * M_PI / 180 ); //keep perpendicular distance between lines constant
2591  width = outputPixelDist / sin( lineAngle * M_PI / 180 );
2592 
2593  // recalculate real angle and distance after rounding to pixels
2594  lineAngle = 180 * atan2(( double ) height, ( double ) width ) / M_PI;
2595  if ( lineAngle < 0 )
2596  {
2597  lineAngle += 360.;
2598  }
2599 
2600  height = qAbs( height );
2601  width = qAbs( width );
2602 
2603  outputPixelDist = height * cos( lineAngle * M_PI / 180 );
2604 
2605  // Round offset to correspond to one pixel height, otherwise lines may
2606  // be shifted on tile border if offset falls close to pixel center
2607  int offsetHeight = qRound( qAbs( outputPixelOffset / cos( lineAngle * M_PI / 180 ) ) );
2608  outputPixelOffset = offsetHeight * cos( lineAngle * M_PI / 180 );
2609  }
2610 
2611  //depending on the angle, we might need to render into a larger image and use a subset of it
2612  double dx = 0;
2613  double dy = 0;
2614 
2615  // Add buffer based on bleed but keep precisely the height/width ratio (angle)
2616  // thus we add integer multiplications of width and height covering the bleed
2617  int bufferMulti = qMax( qCeil( outputPixelBleed / width ), qCeil( outputPixelBleed / width ) );
2618 
2619  // Always buffer at least once so that center of line marker in upper right corner
2620  // does not fall outside due to representation error
2621  bufferMulti = qMax( bufferMulti, 1 );
2622 
2623  int xBuffer = width * bufferMulti;
2624  int yBuffer = height * bufferMulti;
2625  int innerWidth = width;
2626  int innerHeight = height;
2627  width += 2 * xBuffer;
2628  height += 2 * yBuffer;
2629 
2630  if ( width > 10000 || height > 10000 ) //protect symbol layer from eating too much memory
2631  {
2632  return;
2633  }
2634 
2635  QImage patternImage( width, height, QImage::Format_ARGB32 );
2636  patternImage.fill( 0 );
2637 
2638  QPointF p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6;
2639  if ( qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 0.0 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 360.0 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 180.0 ) )
2640  {
2641  p1 = QPointF( 0, yBuffer );
2642  p2 = QPointF( width, yBuffer );
2643  p3 = QPointF( 0, yBuffer + innerHeight );
2644  p4 = QPointF( width, yBuffer + innerHeight );
2645  }
2646  else if ( qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 90.0 ) || qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 270.0 ) )
2647  {
2648  p1 = QPointF( xBuffer, height );
2649  p2 = QPointF( xBuffer, 0 );
2650  p3 = QPointF( xBuffer + innerWidth, height );
2651  p4 = QPointF( xBuffer + innerWidth, 0 );
2652  }
2653  else if ( lineAngle > 0 && lineAngle < 90 )
2654  {
2655  dx = outputPixelDist * cos(( 90 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180.0 );
2656  dy = outputPixelDist * sin(( 90 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180.0 );
2657  p1 = QPointF( 0, height );
2658  p2 = QPointF( width, 0 );
2659  p3 = QPointF( -dx, height - dy );
2660  p4 = QPointF( width - dx, -dy );
2661  p5 = QPointF( dx, height + dy );
2662  p6 = QPointF( width + dx, dy );
2663  }
2664  else if ( lineAngle > 180 && lineAngle < 270 )
2665  {
2666  dx = outputPixelDist * cos(( 90 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180.0 );
2667  dy = outputPixelDist * sin(( 90 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180.0 );
2668  p1 = QPointF( width, 0 );
2669  p2 = QPointF( 0, height );
2670  p3 = QPointF( width - dx, -dy );
2671  p4 = QPointF( -dx, height - dy );
2672  p5 = QPointF( width + dx, dy );
2673  p6 = QPointF( dx, height + dy );
2674  }
2675  else if ( lineAngle > 90 && lineAngle < 180 )
2676  {
2677  dy = outputPixelDist * cos(( 180 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180 );
2678  dx = outputPixelDist * sin(( 180 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180 );
2679  p1 = QPointF( 0, 0 );
2680  p2 = QPointF( width, height );
2681  p5 = QPointF( dx, -dy );
2682  p6 = QPointF( width + dx, height - dy );
2683  p3 = QPointF( -dx, dy );
2684  p4 = QPointF( width - dx, height + dy );
2685  }
2686  else if ( lineAngle > 270 && lineAngle < 360 )
2687  {
2688  dy = outputPixelDist * cos(( 180 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180 );
2689  dx = outputPixelDist * sin(( 180 - lineAngle ) * M_PI / 180 );
2690  p1 = QPointF( width, height );
2691  p2 = QPointF( 0, 0 );
2692  p5 = QPointF( width + dx, height - dy );
2693  p6 = QPointF( dx, -dy );
2694  p3 = QPointF( width - dx, height + dy );
2695  p4 = QPointF( -dx, dy );
2696  }
2697 
2698  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( mOffset, 0.0 ) ) //shift everything
2699  {
2700  QPointF tempPt;
2701  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p1, p3, outputPixelDist + outputPixelOffset );
2702  p3 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );
2703  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p2, p4, outputPixelDist + outputPixelOffset );
2704  p4 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );
2705  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p1, p5, outputPixelDist - outputPixelOffset );
2706  p5 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );
2707  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p2, p6, outputPixelDist - outputPixelOffset );
2708  p6 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );
2709 
2710  //update p1, p2 last
2711  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p1, p3, outputPixelOffset );
2712  p1 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );
2713  tempPt = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pointOnLineWithDistance( p2, p4, outputPixelOffset );
2714  p2 = QPointF( tempPt.x(), tempPt.y() );;
2715  }
2716 
2717  QPainter p( &patternImage );
2718 
2719 #if 0
2720  // DEBUG: Draw rectangle
2721  p.setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing, false ); // get true rect
2722  QPen pen( QColor( Qt::black ) );
2723  pen.setWidthF( 0.1 );
2724  pen.setCapStyle( Qt::FlatCap );
2725  p.setPen( pen );
2726 
2727  // To see this rectangle, comment buffer cut below.
2728  // Subtract 1 because not antialiased are rendered to the right/down by 1 pixel
2729  QPolygon polygon = QPolygon() << QPoint( 0, 0 ) << QPoint( width - 1, 0 ) << QPoint( width - 1, height - 1 ) << QPoint( 0, height - 1 ) << QPoint( 0, 0 );
2730  p.drawPolygon( polygon );
2731 
2732  polygon = QPolygon() << QPoint( xBuffer, yBuffer ) << QPoint( width - xBuffer - 1, yBuffer ) << QPoint( width - xBuffer - 1, height - yBuffer - 1 ) << QPoint( xBuffer, height - yBuffer - 1 ) << QPoint( xBuffer, yBuffer );
2733  p.drawPolygon( polygon );
2734 #endif
2735 
2736  // Use antialiasing because without antialiasing lines are rendered to the
2737  // right and below the mathematically defined points (not symetrical)
2738  // and such tiles become useless for are filling
2739  p.setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing, true );
2740 
2741  // line rendering needs context for drawing on patternImage
2742  QgsRenderContext lineRenderContext;
2743  lineRenderContext.setPainter( &p );
2744  lineRenderContext.setRasterScaleFactor( 1.0 );
2745  lineRenderContext.setScaleFactor( context.renderContext().scaleFactor() * context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
2746  QgsMapToPixel mtp( context.renderContext().mapToPixel().mapUnitsPerPixel() / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
2747  lineRenderContext.setMapToPixel( mtp );
2748  lineRenderContext.setForceVectorOutput( false );
2749 
2750  fillLineSymbol->startRender( lineRenderContext, context.fields() );
2751 
2752  QVector<QPolygonF> polygons;
2753  polygons.append( QPolygonF() << p1 << p2 );
2754  polygons.append( QPolygonF() << p3 << p4 );
2755  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 0 ) && !qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 360 ) && !qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 90 ) && !qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 180 ) && !qgsDoubleNear( lineAngle, 270 ) )
2756  {
2757  polygons.append( QPolygonF() << p5 << p6 );
2758  }
2759 
2760  foreach ( QPolygonF polygon, polygons )
2761  {
2762  fillLineSymbol->renderPolyline( polygon, context.feature(), lineRenderContext, -1, context.selected() );
2763  }
2764 
2765  fillLineSymbol->stopRender( lineRenderContext );
2766  p.end();
2767 
2768  // Cut off the buffer
2769  patternImage = patternImage.copy( xBuffer, yBuffer, patternImage.width() - 2 * xBuffer, patternImage.height() - 2 * yBuffer );
2770 
2771  //set image to mBrush
2772  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( context.alpha(), 1.0 ) )
2773  {
2774  QImage transparentImage = patternImage.copy();
2775  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::multiplyImageOpacity( &transparentImage, context.alpha() );
2776  brush.setTextureImage( transparentImage );
2777  }
2778  else
2779  {
2780  brush.setTextureImage( patternImage );
2781  }
2782 
2783  QTransform brushTransform;
2784  brushTransform.scale( 1.0 / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor(), 1.0 / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
2785  brush.setTransform( brushTransform );
2786 
2787  delete fillLineSymbol;
2788 }
2789

2793 
2794  if ( mFillLineSymbol )
2795  {
2796  mFillLineSymbol->startRender( context.renderContext(), context.fields() );
2797  }
2798 
2799  prepareExpressions( context.fields(), context.renderContext().rendererScale() );
2800 }

2836 void QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer::toSld( QDomDocument &doc, QDomElement &element, QgsStringMap props ) const
2837 {
2838  QDomElement symbolizerElem = doc.createElement( "se:PolygonSymbolizer" );
2839  if ( !props.value( "uom", "" ).isEmpty() )
2840  symbolizerElem.setAttribute( "uom", props.value( "uom", "" ) );
2841  element.appendChild( symbolizerElem );
2842 
2843  // <Geometry>
2844  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createGeometryElement( doc, symbolizerElem, props.value( "geom", "" ) );
2845 
2846  QDomElement fillElem = doc.createElement( "se:Fill" );
2847  symbolizerElem.appendChild( fillElem );
2848 
2849  QDomElement graphicFillElem = doc.createElement( "se:GraphicFill" );
2850  fillElem.appendChild( graphicFillElem );
2851 
2852  QDomElement graphicElem = doc.createElement( "se:Graphic" );
2853  graphicFillElem.appendChild( graphicElem );
2854 
2855  //line properties must be inside the graphic definition
2856  QColor lineColor = mFillLineSymbol ? mFillLineSymbol->color() : QColor();
2857  double lineWidth = mFillLineSymbol ? mFillLineSymbol->width() : 0.0;
2858  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::wellKnownMarkerToSld( doc, graphicElem, "horline", QColor(), lineColor, Qt::SolidLine, lineWidth, mDistance );
2859 
2860  // <Rotation>
2861  QString angleFunc;
2862  bool ok;
2863  double angle = props.value( "angle", "0" ).toDouble( &ok );
2864  if ( !ok )
2865  {
2866  angleFunc = QString( "%1 + %2" ).arg( props.value( "angle", "0" ) ).arg( mLineAngle );
2867  }
2868  else if ( angle + mLineAngle != 0 )
2869  {
2870  angleFunc = QString::number( angle + mLineAngle );
2871  }
2872  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createRotationElement( doc, graphicElem, angleFunc );
2873 
2874  // <se:Displacement>
2875  QPointF lineOffset( sin( mLineAngle ) * mOffset, cos( mLineAngle ) * mOffset );
2876  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createDisplacementElement( doc, graphicElem, lineOffset );
2877 }
2878 
2879 QString QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer::ogrFeatureStyleWidth( double widthScaleFactor ) const
2880 {
2881  QString featureStyle;
2882  featureStyle.append( "Brush(" );
2883  featureStyle.append( QString( "fc:%1" ).arg( mColor.name() ) );
2884  featureStyle.append( QString( ",bc:%1" ).arg( "#00000000" ) ); //transparent background
2885  featureStyle.append( ",id:\"ogr-brush-2\"" );
2886  featureStyle.append( QString( ",a:%1" ).arg( mLineAngle ) );
2887  featureStyle.append( QString( ",s:%1" ).arg( mLineWidth * widthScaleFactor ) );
2888  featureStyle.append( ",dx:0mm" );
2889  featureStyle.append( QString( ",dy:%1mm" ).arg( mDistance * widthScaleFactor ) );
2890  featureStyle.append( ")" );
2891  return featureStyle;

2894 void QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer::applyDataDefinedSettings( const QgsSymbolV2RenderContext& context )
2895 {
2896  QgsExpression* lineAngleExpression = expression( "lineangle" );
2897  QgsExpression* distanceExpression = expression( "distance" );
2898  QgsExpression* lineWidthExpression = expression( "linewidth" );
2899  QgsExpression* colorExpression = expression( "color" );
2900  if ( !lineAngleExpression && !distanceExpression && !lineWidthExpression && !colorExpression )
2901  {
2902  return; //no data defined settings
2903  }
2904 
2905  double lineAngle = mLineAngle;
2906  if ( lineAngleExpression )
2907  {
2908  lineAngle = lineAngleExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
2909  }
2910  double distance = mDistance;
2911  if ( distanceExpression )
2912  {
2913  distance = distanceExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
2914  }
2915  double lineWidth = mLineWidth;
2916  if ( lineWidthExpression )
2917  {
2918  lineWidth = lineWidthExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
2919  }
2920  QColor color = mColor;
2921  if ( colorExpression )
2922  {
2923  color = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodeColor( colorExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toString() );
2924  }
2925  applyPattern( context, mBrush, lineAngle, distance, lineWidth, color );
2926 }

2928 QgsSymbolLayerV2* QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer::createFromSld( QDomElement &element )
2929 {
2930  QgsDebugMsg( "Entered." );
2931 
2932  QString name;
2933  QColor fillColor, lineColor;
2934  double size, lineWidth;
2935  Qt::PenStyle lineStyle;
2936 
2937  QDomElement fillElem = element.firstChildElement( "Fill" );
2938  if ( fillElem.isNull() )
2939  return NULL;
2940 
2941  QDomElement graphicFillElem = fillElem.firstChildElement( "GraphicFill" );
2942  if ( graphicFillElem.isNull() )
2943  return NULL;
2944 
2945  QDomElement graphicElem = graphicFillElem.firstChildElement( "Graphic" );
2946  if ( graphicElem.isNull() )
2947  return NULL;
2948 
2949  if ( !QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::wellKnownMarkerFromSld( graphicElem, name, fillColor, lineColor, lineStyle, lineWidth, size ) )
2950  return NULL;
2951 
2952  if ( name != "horline" )
2953  return NULL;
2954 
2955  double angle = 0.0;
2956  QString angleFunc;
2957  if ( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::rotationFromSldElement( graphicElem, angleFunc ) )
2958  {
2959  bool ok;
2960  double d = angleFunc.toDouble( &ok );
2961  if ( ok )
2962  angle = d;
2963  }
2964 
2965  double offset = 0.0;
2966  QPointF vectOffset;
2967  if ( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::displacementFromSldElement( graphicElem, vectOffset ) )
2968  {
2969  offset = sqrt( pow( vectOffset.x(), 2 ) + pow( vectOffset.y(), 2 ) );
2970  }
2971 
2972  QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer* sl = new QgsLinePatternFillSymbolLayer();
2973  sl->setColor( lineColor );
2974  sl->setLineWidth( lineWidth );
2975  sl->setLineAngle( angle );
2976  sl->setOffset( offset );
2977  sl->setDistance( size );
2978 
2979  // try to get the outline
2980  QDomElement strokeElem = element.firstChildElement( "Stroke" );
2981  if ( !strokeElem.isNull() )
2982  {
2983  QgsSymbolLayerV2 *l = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createLineLayerFromSld( strokeElem );
2984  if ( l )
2985  {
2986  QgsSymbolLayerV2List layers;
2987  layers.append( l );
2988  sl->setSubSymbol( new QgsLineSymbolV2( layers ) );
2989  }
2990  }
2991 
2992  return sl;
2993 }

3141 void QgsPointPatternFillSymbolLayer::applyPattern( const QgsSymbolV2RenderContext& context, QBrush& brush, double distanceX, double distanceY,
3142  double displacementX, double displacementY )
3143 {
3144  //render 3 rows and columns in one go to easily incorporate displacement
3145  const QgsRenderContext& ctx = context.renderContext();
3146  double width = distanceX * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mDistanceXUnit, mDistanceXMapUnitScale ) * 2.0;
3147  double height = distanceY * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mDistanceYUnit, mDisplacementYMapUnitScale ) * 2.0;
3148 
3149  if ( width > 10000 || height > 10000 ) //protect symbol layer from eating too much memory
3150  {
3151  QImage img;
3152  brush.setTextureImage( img );
3153  return;
3154  }
3155 
3156  QImage patternImage( width, height, QImage::Format_ARGB32 );
3157  patternImage.fill( 0 );
3158 
3159  if ( mMarkerSymbol )
3160  {
3161  QPainter p( &patternImage );
3162 
3163  //marker rendering needs context for drawing on patternImage
3164  QgsRenderContext pointRenderContext;
3165  pointRenderContext.setRendererScale( context.renderContext().rendererScale() );
3166  pointRenderContext.setPainter( &p );
3167  pointRenderContext.setRasterScaleFactor( 1.0 );
3168  pointRenderContext.setScaleFactor( context.renderContext().scaleFactor() * context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
3169  QgsMapToPixel mtp( context.renderContext().mapToPixel().mapUnitsPerPixel() / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
3170  pointRenderContext.setMapToPixel( mtp );
3171  pointRenderContext.setForceVectorOutput( false );
3172 
3173  mMarkerSymbol->startRender( pointRenderContext, context.fields() );
3174 
3175  //render corner points
3176  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( 0, 0 ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3177  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width, 0 ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3178  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( 0, height ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3179  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width, height ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3180 
3181  //render displaced points
3182  double displacementPixelX = displacementX * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mDisplacementXUnit, mDisplacementXMapUnitScale );
3183  double displacementPixelY = displacementY * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( ctx, mDisplacementYUnit, mDisplacementYMapUnitScale );
3184  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width / 2.0, -displacementPixelY ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3185  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( displacementPixelX, height / 2.0 ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3186  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width / 2.0 + displacementPixelX, height / 2.0 - displacementPixelY ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3187  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width + displacementPixelX, height / 2.0 ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3188  mMarkerSymbol->renderPoint( QPointF( width / 2.0, height - displacementPixelY ), context.feature(), pointRenderContext );
3189 
3190  mMarkerSymbol->stopRender( pointRenderContext );
3191  }
3192 
3193  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( context.alpha(), 1.0 ) )
3194  {
3195  QImage transparentImage = patternImage.copy();
3196  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::multiplyImageOpacity( &transparentImage, context.alpha() );
3197  brush.setTextureImage( transparentImage );
3198  }
3199  else
3200  {
3201  brush.setTextureImage( patternImage );
3202  }
3203  QTransform brushTransform;
3204  brushTransform.scale( 1.0 / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor(), 1.0 / context.renderContext().rasterScaleFactor() );
3205  brush.setTransform( brushTransform );
3206 }

3258 void QgsPointPatternFillSymbolLayer::toSld( QDomDocument &doc, QDomElement &element, QgsStringMap props ) const
3259 {
3260  for ( int i = 0; i < mMarkerSymbol->symbolLayerCount(); i++ )
3261  {
3262  QDomElement symbolizerElem = doc.createElement( "se:PolygonSymbolizer" );
3263  if ( !props.value( "uom", "" ).isEmpty() )
3264  symbolizerElem.setAttribute( "uom", props.value( "uom", "" ) );
3265  element.appendChild( symbolizerElem );
3266 
3267  // <Geometry>
3268  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createGeometryElement( doc, symbolizerElem, props.value( "geom", "" ) );
3269 
3270  QDomElement fillElem = doc.createElement( "se:Fill" );
3271  symbolizerElem.appendChild( fillElem );
3272 
3273  QDomElement graphicFillElem = doc.createElement( "se:GraphicFill" );
3274  fillElem.appendChild( graphicFillElem );
3275 
3276  // store distanceX, distanceY, displacementX, displacementY in a <VendorOption>
3277  QString dist = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::encodePoint( QPointF( mDistanceX, mDistanceY ) );
3278  QDomElement distanceElem = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::createVendorOptionElement( doc, "distance", dist );
3279  symbolizerElem.appendChild( distanceElem );
3280 
3281  QgsSymbolLayerV2 *layer = mMarkerSymbol->symbolLayer( i );
3282  QgsMarkerSymbolLayerV2 *markerLayer = static_cast<QgsMarkerSymbolLayerV2 *>( layer );
3283  if ( !markerLayer )
3284  {
3285  QString errorMsg = QString( "MarkerSymbolLayerV2 expected, %1 found. Skip it." ).arg( layer->layerType() );
3286  graphicFillElem.appendChild( doc.createComment( errorMsg ) );
3287  }
3288  else
3289  {
3290  markerLayer->writeSldMarker( doc, graphicFillElem, props );
3291  }
3292  }
3293 }

3551 QgsSymbolLayerV2 *QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer::create( const QgsStringMap &properties )
3552 {
3553  FillCoordinateMode mode = QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer::Feature;
3554  double alpha = 1.0;
3555  QPointF offset;
3556  double angle = 0.0;
3557  double width = 0.0;
3558 
3559  QString imagePath;
3560  if ( properties.contains( "imageFile" ) )
3561  {
3562  imagePath = properties["imageFile"];
3563  }
3564  if ( properties.contains( "coordinate_mode" ) )
3565  {
3566  mode = ( FillCoordinateMode )properties["coordinate_mode"].toInt();
3567  }
3568  if ( properties.contains( "alpha" ) )
3569  {
3570  alpha = properties["alpha"].toDouble();
3571  }
3572  if ( properties.contains( "offset" ) )
3573  {
3574  offset = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodePoint( properties["offset"] );
3575  }
3576  if ( properties.contains( "angle" ) )
3577  {
3578  angle = properties["angle"].toDouble();
3579  }
3580  if ( properties.contains( "width" ) )
3581  {
3582  width = properties["width"].toDouble();
3583  }
3584  QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer* symbolLayer = new QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer( imagePath );
3585  symbolLayer->setCoordinateMode( mode );
3586  symbolLayer->setAlpha( alpha );
3587  symbolLayer->setOffset( offset );
3588  symbolLayer->setAngle( angle );
3589  symbolLayer->setWidth( width );
3590  if ( properties.contains( "offset_unit" ) )
3591  {
3592  symbolLayer->setOffsetUnit( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodeOutputUnit( properties["offset_unit"] ) );
3593  }
3594  if ( properties.contains( "offset_map_unit_scale" ) )
3595  {
3596  symbolLayer->setOffsetMapUnitScale( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodeMapUnitScale( properties["offset_map_unit_scale"] ) );
3597  }
3598  if ( properties.contains( "width_unit" ) )
3599  {
3600  symbolLayer->setWidthUnit( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodeOutputUnit( properties["width_unit"] ) );
3601  }
3602  if ( properties.contains( "width_map_unit_scale" ) )
3603  {
3604  symbolLayer->setWidthMapUnitScale( QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::decodeMapUnitScale( properties["width_map_unit_scale"] ) );
3605  }
3606 
3607  //data defined
3608  if ( properties.contains( "file_expression" ) )
3609  {
3610  symbolLayer->setDataDefinedProperty( "file", properties["file_expression"] );
3611  }
3612  if ( properties.contains( "alpha_expression" ) )
3613  {
3614  symbolLayer->setDataDefinedProperty( "alpha", properties["alpha_expression"] );
3615  }
3616  if ( properties.contains( "angle_expression" ) )
3617  {
3618  symbolLayer->setDataDefinedProperty( "angle", properties["angle_expression"] );
3619  }
3620  if ( properties.contains( "width_expression" ) )
3621  {
3622  symbolLayer->setDataDefinedProperty( "width", properties["width_expression"] );
3623  }
3624  return symbolLayer;
3625 }

3638 void QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer::renderPolygon( const QPolygonF &points, QList<QPolygonF> *rings, QgsSymbolV2RenderContext &context )
3639 {
3640  QPainter* p = context.renderContext().painter();
3641  if ( !p )
3642  {
3643  return;
3644  }
3645 
3646  QPointF offset;
3647  if ( !mOffset.isNull() )
3648  {
3649  offset.setX( mOffset.x() * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::lineWidthScaleFactor( context.renderContext(), mOffsetUnit, mOffsetMapUnitScale ) );
3650  offset.setY( mOffset.y() * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::lineWidthScaleFactor( context.renderContext(), mOffsetUnit, mOffsetMapUnitScale ) );
3651  p->translate( offset );
3652  }
3653  if ( mCoordinateMode == Feature )
3654  {
3655  QRectF boundingRect = points.boundingRect();
3656  mBrush.setTransform( mBrush.transform().translate( boundingRect.left() - mBrush.transform().dx(),
3657  boundingRect.top() - mBrush.transform().dy() ) );
3658  }
3659 
3660  QgsImageFillSymbolLayer::renderPolygon( points, rings, context );
3661  if ( !mOffset.isNull() )
3662  {
3663  p->translate( -offset );
3664  }
3665 }

3731 
3732 void QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer::applyDataDefinedSettings( const QgsSymbolV2RenderContext &context )
3733 {
3734  if ( mDataDefinedProperties.isEmpty() )
3735  return; // shortcut
3736 
3737  QgsExpression* widthExpression = expression( "width" );
3738  QgsExpression* fileExpression = expression( "file" );
3739  QgsExpression* alphaExpression = expression( "alpha" );
3740  QgsExpression* angleExpression = expression( "angle" );
3741 
3742  if ( !widthExpression && !angleExpression && !alphaExpression && !fileExpression )
3743  {
3744  return; //no data defined settings
3745  }
3746 
3747  if ( angleExpression )
3748  {
3749  mNextAngle = angleExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
3750  }
3751 
3752  if ( !widthExpression && !alphaExpression && !fileExpression )
3753  {
3754  return; //nothing further to do
3755  }
3756 
3757  double width = mWidth;
3758  if ( widthExpression )
3759  {
3760  width = widthExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
3761  }
3762  double alpha = mAlpha;
3763  if ( alphaExpression )
3764  {
3765  alpha = alphaExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toDouble();
3766  }
3767  QString file = mImageFilePath;
3768  if ( fileExpression )
3769  {
3770  file = fileExpression->evaluate( const_cast<QgsFeature*>( context.feature() ) ).toString();
3771  }
3772  applyPattern( mBrush, file, width, alpha, context );
3773 }
3774 
3775 void QgsRasterFillSymbolLayer::applyPattern( QBrush &brush, const QString &imageFilePath, const double width, const double alpha, const QgsSymbolV2RenderContext &context )
3776 {
3777  QImage image( imageFilePath );
3778  if ( image.isNull() )
3779  {
3780  return;
3781  }
3782  if ( !image.hasAlphaChannel() )
3783  {
3784  image = image.convertToFormat( QImage::Format_ARGB32 );
3785  }
3786 
3787  double pixelWidth;
3788  if ( width > 0 )
3789  {
3790  pixelWidth = width * QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::pixelSizeScaleFactor( context.renderContext(), mWidthUnit, mWidthMapUnitScale );
3791  }
3792  else
3793  {
3794  pixelWidth = image.width();
3795  }
3796 
3797  //reduce alpha of image
3798  if ( alpha < 1.0 )
3799  {
3800  QPainter p;
3801  p.begin( &image );
3802  p.setCompositionMode( QPainter::CompositionMode_DestinationIn );
3803  QColor alphaColor( 0, 0, 0 );
3804  alphaColor.setAlphaF( alpha );
3805  p.fillRect( image.rect(), alphaColor );
3806  p.end();
3807  }
3808 
3809  //resize image if required
3810  if ( !qgsDoubleNear( pixelWidth, image.width() ) )
3811  {
3812  image = image.scaledToWidth( pixelWidth, Qt::SmoothTransformation );
3813  }
3814 
3815  brush.setTextureImage( image );
3816 }
